name: Bullet Hell Jam - Rambo's Brother
description:
Welcome to the Bullet Hell Jam submission "Rambo's Brother"

You are John Rambo's brother - unknown to the public, you are fighting a war of your own...A war against the undead...Who would have known that the fate will not be decided by John Rambo himself, but by his little brother?

Enjoy a 2D top-down shooter with plenty of projectiles. The more enemies you kill, the more bullets you shoot, thus increasing the chances of killing yourself (bullets bounce off the walls).

I strongly recommend downloading the game over playing the WebGL version, as it runs much smoother and the effects are a bit nicer (the WebGL build feels a bit laggy in my opinion! Please use fullscreen if you do want to play the web version).

You can earn up to three achievements if you are tough enough to survive this jungle bullet hell:

  • Survive 1 minute
  • Shoot 200 bullets in one game
  • Shoot 100 enemies in one game

Controls:

WASD to move, aim with mouse cursor, left mouse button to shoot, that's it :)

Credits:

All assets (with the exception of the font: "Bad Signal"  https://www.dafont.com/bad-signal.font) are created by myself. I made my first attempt of audio-recording my guitar, and it might not sound amazing, but I wanted to try something new this Jam :)

Thanks for playing and feel free to provide constructive feedback!
